pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate, Visualise, and Evaluate Fast-and-Frugal Decision Trees // Create, visualize, and test fast-and-frugal decision trees (FFTs). FFTs are very simple decision trees for classifying cases (i.e.; breast cancer patients) into one of two classes (e.g.; no cancer vs. true cancer) based on a small number of cues (e.g.; test results). FFTs can be preferable to more complex algorithms because they are easy to communicate, require very little information, and are robust against overfitting.
